title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing a 'copy package' operation in the Package Viewer of project A, the package 'ui' is unexpectedly included in the resulting project 'xx'. This behavior is observed in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui plugin of jdt.ui version 3.
OB: After copying a package in the Package Viewer, the destination project 'xx' contains a package named 'ui'.
EB: After copying a package in the Package Viewer, the destination project 'xx' should not contain a package named 'ui'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new project named 'xxx2'.
2. Open the Package Viewer.
3. Select a package in project A.
4. From the context menu, choose 'Copy'.
5. Verify that the package 'ui' is copied to the destination project 'xx'.
